comments.body: [~jloza]: Just a heads up that dialog style fixes are being addressed in GUI-2504.  I noticed an issue where the empty chart container borders (e.g. on the ELB monitoring page) bleed through the modal background.  Will fix that in GUI-2504 as well.
items are not in order shown on wireframe
[~jloza]: Ah, I thought [~ashamblin] fixed the metrics ordering.  Will confirm...
Screenshot attached, list is very strange now. Cleared cache, restarted console, IDK...
[~jloza]: [~dkavanagh] mentioned the duplicate metrics list could be related to what he observed with duplicate dimensions on the alarm details page (see GUI-2525).  Troubleshooting...

[~jloza]: It seems fetching all metrics via the listMetrics API is unreliable as demonstrated in your screenshot.  I reproduced what you observed on the latest dev cloud in acct-00/admin.  The ELB has CW data, but only for the healthy/unhealthy host counts.  As the other metrics don't have data, only the healthy/unhealthy host metrics are populated in the create alarm dialog (and populated twice due to multiple dimensions).

[~ashamblin] and I spoke via a Lync screenshare session and we converged on using our static metric lists for populating the metric choices, with listMetrics used to pull in custom metrics (as was originally spec'd in the description in GUI-2505).  I'm going to make that change in a separate ticket since it will be needed across all places where the create alarm dialog is used.
Going to use GUI-2505 to track the work of moving our metrics list choices to a static list, per that ticket's title/description.

[~ashamblin]: Could you review https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1888 and punt it back to me after merging that PR?  Would help me implement/test the metrics list fixes on the ELB monitoring page when working on GUI-2505.
Reviewed, passed and merged to master.  Please review on master.

[~jloza]: I'm working on the fixes to the metrics list on GUI-2505.  We merged PR 1888 to facilitate testing GUI-2505 for the Create Alarm dialog on the ELB monitoring page. Will keep you posted when this one is ready for UX review again.

Please use the GUI-2505 branch to verify this.

PR is at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1890
UX review passed, yay! Ready for code review.
